name: NinjaBot SUIT
description:
NinjaBot SUIT is a skill game where you have control of a ninja with a robot suit capable of shooting Kunais, with this suit the ninja can also jump from one building to another to get up to the heart of the evil company that controls this Futuristic universe.

The game is in phase  beta, and I hope to be able to take it out in April 2020 to the android  playstore.
